_header: Miles Rogerus by ten mile wones he too near us
Subjects: satire; Belers, Roger, sir; historical verse
_description: A macaronic satire in Latin and English on Sir Roger Belers, murdered 1326 — five couplets

BLRoy12Cxiv.First Lines:
Miles Roger by ten mile wons he to neer vsOmnibus austerus fuerat
                    quod scit bene clerus…
BLRoy12Cxiv.Last Lines:
…Tum cum vi regis tum cum velamine legisPauperis ipse gregis
                    in il tyme flith he hys segis
BLRoy12Cxiv.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “Versus Compositi de Roger Belers.” 
             Journal of English and Germanic Philology
         56 (1957): 440-2: 441-2.
